page.title: 15Leisure and Recreation -1
page.content: As the area is mainly farmland, with scattered villages, leisure activities are predominantly localised eg.village {football}and{cricket}teams, and{darts and{skittle}teams centred on village pubs.This region is well known for its illuminated{carnival}processions in late autumn;many communities have their own carnival clubs, whose aims are to raise funds for charities by building floats to take part in the processions. The village of Camerton held an annual steam{traction-engine rally}which was very widely supported and attracted steam enthusiasts from the whole of the West Country and beyond.
